EmailTemplate.subject: Results for the JACOB'S CREEK "Win a Trip to Australian Open 2017" contest
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=]]>.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Results for the JACOB'S CREEK "Win a Trip to Australian Open 2017" contest
Congratulations to all the winners of the Jacob's Creek "Win a Trip to Australian Open 2017" contest!
1st Prize Winner: ANGELA TONG (SXXXX207H)
WIN a full hospitality package for 2 people, including return economy class airfares and tickets to the Australian Open in Melbourne, Australia.
Period of travel is January 2017.
Consolation Prizes:
15 x $100 Royal Sporting House vouchers
Hsia yuin Low (SXXXX762A)
Hui Leng Tan (SXXXX797F)
Carmen Mo Boon Foong (SXXXX129F)
olivier chouchana (GXXXX433P)
Yu Haw Ong (SXXXX678F)
Kek Keng Lee (SXXXX961D)
Paul Tai (SXXXX207C)
ZI XIANG CHUA (SXXXX471B)
Judy Suyee Ho (SXXXX177B)
YEE FAH POK (SXXXX579Z)
Shankar Tarakad (SXXXX685G)
Mark Lim (SXXXX794G)
Su li Chia (SXXXX212c)
ZHIHAN KOO (SXXXX204D)
SIONG KUN LIM (SXXXX443B)
Thank you for your active participation and support for Jacob's Creek!
Yours Sincerely,
Jacob's Creek Team
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
